name: Ca'puccino

name: Joe & The Juice
description: Health-focused juices, smoothies, and sandwiches.

description: Innovative British cuisine by celebrity chef Heston Blumenthal.

name: Wondertree
description: Family-friendly all-day dining with global comfort food.

name: Plaza Premium Lounge
description: Independent premium lounge with food, drinks, and showers.

name: Burberry
description: Iconic British luxury brand offering fashion and accessories.

name: WHSmith
description: Books, snacks, and last-minute travel items.

name: World Duty Free
description: Tax-free goods including fragrances, alcohol, and travel exclusives.

name: Aerotel London Heathrow
description: Compact hourly hotel with ensuite rooms inside T3 arrivals. Ideal for long layovers, early flights, or unexpected delays. Bookable by hour or overnight. Walk-in accepted based on availability.

name: Aerotel London Heathrow (T3, near T2 access)
description: Hourly hotel with ensuite rooms. Ideal for layovers, early arrivals, or overnight rest. Located in T3 but easily accessible from T2 via walkway. Book online or walk-in.
location_description: Landside, T3 Arrivals, 10-min walk from T2

name: The Commission by Drake & Morgan
description: Stylish cocktail bar and eatery with all-day menu. Great for solo travelers or social drinks.

name: Caffè Nero
description: Italian-style espresso, sandwiches, and pastries. Grab & go friendly with plenty of seating.

name: Pret a Manger
description: Freshly made food, organic coffee, and vegan-friendly options. Great for fast casual dining.
location_description: Airside, Main retail concourse, near security

name: World Duty Free
description: Extensive range of alcohol, beauty, fragrance, and travel retail exclusives. Open to all international travelers.

name: YOTELAIR London Heathrow
description: Futuristic sleep pods and compact cabins available by the hour or overnight. Equipped with smart beds, Wi-Fi, private showers. Accessible without passing security—perfect for transit or work-catchup stops.

name: El Al King David Lounge
description: Serves El Al Business and First Class passengers. Kosher catering and Israeli press available.

name: Gulf Air Falcon Gold Lounge
description: Access for Gulf Air premium passengers. Offers quiet seating, refreshments, and flight views.

name: Plaza Premium Lounge
description: Pay-per-use lounge with food, drinks, shower, and rest areas. Open to all travelers regardless of airline.

name: SkyTeam Lounge
description: Exclusive access for SkyTeam Elite Plus and Business Class travelers. Features a wellness area and buffet.

name: Burberry
description: Iconic British fashion house offering trench coats, bags, scarves, and travelwear. Duty-free pricing.

name: Hugo Boss
description: Stylish menswear and accessories including tailoring and travel attire.
location_description: Airside, Near central shopping arcade, T4

name: Michael Kors
description: Handbags, watches, and fashion accessories in a contemporary American style.

name: Boots
description: Health, beauty, sandwiches, and toiletries. Pre-order available online.

name: WHSmith
description: Books, drinks, snacks, magazines, and travel essentials.
location_description: Airside, Gate 4 and near main entrance

name: Comptoir Libanais
description: Colorful Lebanese dishes including wraps, tagines, mezze, and desserts. Vegetarian options available.
location_description: Airside, Food terrace, near retail arcade

name: Glorious Britain
description: London-themed souvenirs, gifts, and UK merchandise. Great for last-minute keepsakes.

name: InMotion
description: Electronics and travel accessories including headphones, chargers, and gadgets.

name: Costa Coffee
description: Espresso drinks, hot breakfast, pastries and snacks. Open early morning to late evening.
location_description: Arrivals (Landside), T4 Arrivals Hall, near exit

name: Travelex Currency Exchange
description: Currency exchange with travel money cards, ATMs, and walk-up counter. Available during flight hours.

name: WHSmith
description: Travel supplies, books, snacks, and convenience items. Publicly accessible post-arrival.
location_description: Arrivals (Landside), Main concourse near car hire desks

name: Information Desk
description: Staffed info point for general airport help, connections, and lost property. Multilingual staff.

name: SIM Card Vending Machine
description: Self-serve kiosk with data SIMs and eSIM QR options. Accepts card and supports 24/7 use.
location_description: Arrivals (Landside), Near baggage carousel and exit

name: Car Rental Desks (Avis, Sixt, Budget, etc.)
description: Major car rental firms with onsite booking and pickup. Reservations and walk-ins welcome.
location_description: Arrivals (Landside), Back of Arrivals near WHSmith

name: Taxi & Rideshare Pickup Point
description: Designated lanes for black cabs, Uber, and private hire. Follow signs outside baggage exit.

name: Gordon Ramsay Plane Food
description: Upscale airport brasserie with cocktails, wine, and British fare. Quick Plane Food To Go option available.

name: Huxleys Restaurant & Bar
description: Traditional British pub with beer, wine, and all-day menu including fish & chips and burgers.

name: World Duty Free – Beauty & Fragrance
description: Perfume, cosmetics, and beauty exclusives. Duty-free pricing for international travelers.

name: Heathrow Personal Shopper Lounge
description: Complimentary service with multilingual staff helping travelers navigate luxury and gifting.

name: T5 Art Walk – British Airways Collection
description: A permanent exhibition of contemporary British art featuring sculptures and photography along the concourse.

name: Sofitel London Heathrow
description: 5-star hotel directly connected to T5 via covered walkway. Ideal for premium travelers, overnight layovers, or pre-flight relaxation. On-site spa, fine dining, and meeting rooms available.
location_description: Connected Landside, Direct walkway from T5 Departures Level

name: WHSmith
description: Books, snacks, drinks, and last-minute travel supplies. Several locations in T5.
location_description: Airside, T5 main concourse and Gate A20

name: Aspire Lounge – Terminal 5
description: Independent lounge open to all passengers with food, drinks, workstations, and showers.

name: British Airways Concorde Room
description: Invite-only luxury lounge with fine dining, private cabanas, and champagne bar.
location_description: Airside, South Lounge complex – behind First Lounge

name: British Airways Galleries Club Lounge (North)
description: Modern lounge with buffet, bar, showers, work areas, and views of the runway.

name: British Airways Galleries Club Lounge (South)
description: South version of BA's business lounge with ample seating, food, drink, and productivity zones.
location_description: Airside, South Lounge complex, near Gate A18

name: British Airways Galleries First Lounge
description: Exclusive lounge with à la carte dining, champagne bar, business area, and spa showers.
location_description: Airside, South Lounge complex, near Gate A18

name: British Airways Galleries Lounge – T5B
description: Smaller satellite lounge for BA Club World passengers transiting through Terminal 5B. Includes food, drinks, Wi-Fi, and seating.
location_description: Airside, Terminal 5B Departures, near Gate B36

name: British Airways Galleries Lounge – T5C
description: Light-use lounge in satellite C pier. Open depending on flight volume and time of day.
